verses.name: Jude 1:7
verses.text: Even as Sodom and Gomorrha, and the cities about them in like manner, giving themselves over to fornication, and going after strange flesh, are set forth for an example, suffering the vengeance of eternal fire.

verses.name: Jude 1:8
verses.text: Likewise also these filthy dreamers defile the flesh, despise dominion, and speak evil of dignities.

verses.name: Jude 1:9
verses.text: Yet Michael the archangel, when contending with the devil he disputed about the body of Moses, durst not bring against him a railing accusation, but said, The Lord rebuke thee.
